mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_num, c.id, c.pnum, c.pqty, p.pimage, p.pname, p.price, p.point, p.pspec FROM winia_cart c, winia_product p WHERE c.pnum = p.pnum AND c.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO winia_cart(id, pnum, pqty) VALUES(#{id}, #{pnum}, #{pqty})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM winia_cart WHERE id = #{id} AND pnum = #{pnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE winia_cart SET pqty = #{pqty} WHERE cart_num = #{cart_num}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM winia_cart WHERE pnum = #{pnum} AND id = #{id}
